features.title: Hand Gesture Based
features.description: Because of hand gesture based, doctors provided with hygiene without touching the electronic gadgets for transforming the images

features.title: Time Saving System
features.description: Doctors may not be lead to manually work on transforming the images. Our system will be done this transformation through hand gesture, so it will save the time.

features.title: Accurate System
features.description: It will predict the doctor's hand gestures accurately and transform the images respectively. Accurate transformation is the main advantage

features.title: High Performance
features.description: It will transform the images in a well optimized manner and transformation will take less time to perform.
